post.author: 이성기
post.content:
관심이 있는 분은 저에게 연락주세요.
Job # / Title: 2962— Java Developer Company / Client: Intech client (On-line Bank) Candidate Submittal Cutoff Date: ASAP Candidate Submittal Cutoff Time: ASAP Position Start Date: ASAP Position End Date: 4- 6 months plus extensions Location: Markham/ Toronto (North) Pay rate: Submit competitive rate Street Address:
Building: Contract Type: contract Number of workers needed: 1 Scheduled Hours Per Week: 40 Shift Hours (e.g. 8am - 5pm) Job/Project Description:
Intech Software Solutions, Inc. is a highly respected Outsourcing & IT Staffing firm, with an excellent track record of successful projects.
Project involves developing new features to an on-line banking system that interfaces with World Bank host systems.
Also build interfaces to World Bank host systems
Intech’s client has a new 5 year contract with the Bank of Montreal
Required Skills: 3 - 5 yrs experience with the following:
Java/J2EE, Websphere, Solaris, XML, UML, JSP, Servlets, EJB, Oracle, SQL, WSAD
Preference given to candidates able to work on a corp-corp basis
Preference will be given to candidates that currently reside in Markham/Toronto, are from Markham/Toronto, Canadian citizens, etc.
Minimum Years of experience needed: 4-5 yrs overall IT experience
Preferred Skills:
Ability to analyze and understand existing STRUTS framework. On-line banking application development and testing experience. Good oral communication skills
What role will the consultant have: Development, enhancements and testing Team Size: 8-20
post.title: Java Developer
